<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2835</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">CNN Student News</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">CNN Kursteilnehmer-Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelles D'Étudiant de CNN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notícia Do Estudante do CNN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notizie Dell'Allievo di CNN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ειδήσεις σπουδαστών CNN</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Noticias Del Estudiante del CNN</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student News site from CNN with educational activities based on the news items.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recordings comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">news</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmer Nachrichten Site von CNN mit 
den pädagogischen Aktivitäten basiert auf den Nachrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un site de nouvelles d'étudiant de CNN avec des 
activités éducatives basées sur les nouvelles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um local da notícia do estudante do CNN com as 
atividades educacionais baseadas nos artigos de notícia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un luogo di notizie dell'allievo dal CNN con le 
attività educative basate sulle notizie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια περιοχή ειδήσεων σπουδαστών από CNN με τις 
εκπαιδευτικές δραστηριότητες βασισμένες στα αντικείμενα ειδήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un sitio de las noticias del estudiante del CNN 
con las actividades educativas basadas en las noticias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
